item.description:
Land's Sake Farm is a non-profit, organic, educational farm in Weston, MA. Incorporated in 1980, they farm over 25 acres of produce, maintain 65 miles of trails and over 2000 acres of conservation land. Many interesting and exotic tree specimens persist from the space's previous history as the Case Estate arboretum, in addition to neighboring fields and forest.

Bring boots, water, Peterson plant fieldguide, and binocs.

If the meeting is cancelled, the website schedule will indicate the new date and/or time at least one hour before the originally planned event. Conversely, if a member must cancel, please email at least one hour in advance.
item.how_to_find_us: my vehicle: red jeep with big wheels
item.name: Land's Sake Farm
